basket.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a container made of thin pieces of plastic, wire, or wood woven together, used to carry things or put things in
basket.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a net with a hole at the bottom, attached to a metal ring, through which the ball is thrown in basketball
basket.translation[0].definitions[1].not: make/shoot a basket (=to throw the ball through the basket)
basket.translation[0].definitions[2].def: the average or total value of a number of different goods or currencies
basket.translation[0].definitions[3].def: the part of a website, often represented by a picture of a basket, where you collect things to buy

basket.translation[0].note_box[0].sectio: He threw her letter in the wastepaper basket.
Will you please put your socks in the laundry basket?
She paid for the apples and put them in her shopping basket.
We took a picnic basket and a rug.
There was a bread basket on the table.
He had a fruit basket sent up to her hotel room.
All the shops had hanging baskets outside their doors.
She stores her vegetables in pretty wicker baskets.
